parentalConsent.title: Welcome to LogiKids
parentalConsent.intro: LogiKids uses AI to generate personalized learning tasks for your child.
parentalConsent.privacyExplained: Unlike most apps, all your child's data is stored exclusively on your device. We use zero-knowledge encryption, which means even we cannot see your data - only you hold the keys.
parentalConsent.privacyBackup: Optional cloud backup is available for convenience, but it's always encrypted on your device before being sent. The server only stores encrypted blobs that are meaningless without your key.
parentalConsent.aiExplained: Every task is dynamically generated by AI to match your child's age, grade level, and learning pace. Content adapts to their progress, providing the right level of challenge at the right time.
parentalConsent.contentExplained: Our AI prompts are specifically designed to generate educational content appropriate for your child's age and grade level. While we instruct the AI to create safe, learning-focused content, we recommend parental supervision as with any educational tool.
parentalConsent.complianceExplained: Full compliance with GDPR regulations and the EU AI Act. You have the right to access, export, or delete all data at any time. No third-party data sharing, ever.
parentalConsent.inviteExplained: LogiKids is currently in closed beta. Please enter the invite code you received to continue.
parentalConsent.consentCheckbox: I am a parent/guardian and confirm that I have read and understood the above information. I understand that this app uses AI to generate educational content and I agree to provide appropriate parental supervision during use.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.paragraph1: At Logikids, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle data in our educational platform.
intro.paragraph2: Our fundamental principle: Your data stays on your device. Period.

dataCollection.title: Data Storage: Local-First by Default
dataCollection.description: Logikids is built with privacy as the foundation:

localOnly.title: No Data Leaves Your Device (Default)
localOnly.description: By default, ALL your child's data - name, age, learning progress, preferences, and account information - is stored ONLY on your device. Nothing is sent to our servers or any third party. The app works completely offline.

noTracking.title: No Analytics or Tracking
noTracking.description: We do not use analytics, tracking cookies, or any third-party tracking services. We do not collect behavioral data, IP addresses, or browsing patterns. Ever.

encrypted.title: Optional Cloud Backup (Disabled by Default)
encrypted.description: You can OPTIONALLY enable cloud backup in settings to sync your data across devices. This is DISABLED by default. If you choose to enable it, all data is encrypted on your device before being sent to our servers. We only store encrypted blobs that are meaningless without your encryption key.

encryption.title: How Optional Cloud Backup Works
encryption.paragraph1: If you explicitly enable cloud backup in settings, all data is encrypted on your device using strong encryption before being transmitted. Your encryption key never leaves your device and is never sent to our servers.
encryption.paragraph2: This zero-knowledge approach means that even if our servers were compromised, your data would remain secure because it's encrypted with keys only you possess. We cannot read, access, or decrypt your data.

aiUsage.title: AI-Generated Content (No Personal Data Sent)
aiUsage.paragraph1: Logikids uses AI (either locally-hosted Ollama or OpenAI) to generate personalized educational tasks for your child. When generating tasks, we send ONLY the necessary context (subject, difficulty level, age range) to the AI provider.
aiUsage.paragraph2: No personal information about your child is ever sent to the AI provider. We do not send names, specific ages, or any identifying information. Task generation is completely stateless and anonymous.

gdprRights.title: Your GDPR Rights
gdprRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: All your data is already on your device. You can export it as a recovery kit (PDF with QR code) at any time through the account settings.

export.title: Right to Export
export.description: You can export your data as a recovery kit to import into another device or keep as an offline backup.

deletion.title: Right to Erasure
deletion.description: You can delete your local data at any time through the account settings. If you have enabled cloud backup, you can also request deletion of the encrypted backup from our servers.

portability.title: Data Portability
portability.description: Your data is fully portable via the recovery kit, allowing you to transfer it between devices or keep offline backups. No vendor lock-in.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Your data stays on your device for as long as you keep the app installed. If you have enabled optional cloud backup, encrypted backups are retained on our servers until you explicitly request deletion. We do not track activity or implement automatic deletion policies. You have full control and can delete your data at any time.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Data Sharing
thirdParty.description: We never share, sell, or transfer your personal data to third parties. Period. Your data stays on your device. The only external service we use is the AI provider for task generation, and we send only anonymous, non-identifying context data (subject, difficulty level, age range - never names or personal information).

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of Logikids after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us via the information provided in the Legal Notice (Impressum).

responsible.title: Responsible for Content
responsible.description: Responsible for the content of this website according to ¬ß 55 Abs. 2 RStV:

content.title: Liability for Content
content.description: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness, or topicality. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages under general laws. However, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.description: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
